headline.main: IONIAN VICTORYLAID TO FLIERS' ATTACKS; British Say the Battle Was Historic Because of Help of Planes to Fleet FLEEING ITALIANS DELAYED London Still Believes That One Battleship Was Badly Hurt -- Rome Denies It

lead_paragraph: LONDON, April 1 -- The first reasonably complete official account of what went on in the naval battle off Greek Cape Matapan in the in the Ionian Sea Friday has now been made public. There was no revision of the earlier report that five Italian warships had been sunk, two more probably had been lost and a battleship's fate was shrouded in mystery.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
